headline: Chase to Issue Apple Card: What's Ahead for Apple's Payments Business?
summary: Chase will become Apple Card issuer within 24 months, as AAPL boosts fintech and Services growth.

raw.headline: Chase to Issue Apple Card: What's Ahead for Apple's Payments Business?

headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in MasterCard (MA): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for MasterCard (MA) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

raw.headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in MasterCard (MA): Read This Before Placing a Bet
raw.summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for MasterCard (MA) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Apple Card switches hands but no immediate changes for users
summary: The Apple Card, known for its intuitive features and other perks for consumers, will now be issued by JPMorgan but Apple says nothing will change for users.  The handover to JP Morgan brings together companies that play an increasingly large role in the way people pay for everything from utility bills to socks using phones, tablets or watches.  Apple said that features including 3% cash back on purchases and high-yield savings account affiliated with the card, will remain.

Apple said that features including 3% cash back on purchases and high-yield savings account affiliated with the card, will remain.

headline: Apple Card Taken Over by JPMorgan. Why Goldman Has Exited the Credit Play.
summary: The deal ends a failed experiment in consumer lending for Goldman Sachs, which launched a card with Apple in 2019.

raw.headline: Apple Card Taken Over by JPMorgan. Why Goldman Has Exited the Credit Play.
raw.summary: The deal ends a failed experiment in consumer lending for Goldman Sachs, which launched a card with Apple in 2019.

headline: JPMorgan to take over Apple credit card from Goldman Sachs
summary: The bank plans to record a $2.2bn provision for credit losses tied to the deal when it reports fourth-quarter 2025 earnings next week.

raw.headline: JPMorgan to take over Apple credit card from Goldman Sachs
raw.summary: The bank plans to record a $2.2bn provision for credit losses tied to the deal when it reports fourth-quarter 2025 earnings next week.

headline: Apple swaps card to JPMorgan
summary: The largest U.S. bank will assume a $20 billion portfolio of Apple customers as Goldman Sachs finishes unwinding its foray into consumer lending.

raw.headline: Apple swaps card to JPMorgan
raw.summary: The largest U.S. bank will assume a $20 billion portfolio of Apple customers as Goldman Sachs finishes unwinding its foray into consumer lending.
